Surface.description:
Represents a boudary surface in three-dimensional space.


Parameters
----------
name : <class 'str'>
Surface.title: Surface

description:
Parameters
----------
frequency : <class 'int'> = -1
    Frequency (in number of physical time steps) at which output is saved. -1 is at end of simulation.
frequency_offset : <class 'int'> = 0
    Offset (in number of physical time steps) at which output animation is started. 0 is at beginning of simulation.
output_format : typing.Literal['paraview', 'tecplot', 'both'] = paraview
        entities : typing.Optional[abc.EntityList[Surface]] = None
        write_single_file : <class 'bool'> = False
    Enable writing all surface outputs into a single file instead of one file per surface. This option currently only supports Tecplot output format. Will choose the value of the last instance of this option of the same output type (SurfaceOutput or TimeAverageSurfaceOutput) in the `output` list.
output_fields : <class 'abc.UniqueAliasedStringList[typing.Literal['Cp', 'gradW', 'kOmega', 'Mach', 'mut', 'mutRatio', 'nuHat', 'primitiveVars', 'qcriterion', 'residualNavierStokes', 'residualTransition', 'residualTurbulence', 's', 'solutionNavierStokes', 'solutionTransition', 'solutionTurbulence', 'T', 'vorticity', 'wallDistance', 'numericalDissipationFactor', 'residualHeatSolver', 'VelocityRelative', 'lowMachPreconditionerSensor', 'CfVec', 'Cf', 'heatFlux', 'nodeNormals', 'nodeForcesPerUnitArea', 'yPlus', 'wallFunctionMetric']]'>
        output_type : typing.Literal['SurfaceOutput'] = SurfaceOutput

frequency.description: Frequency (in number of physical time steps) at which output is saved. -1 is at end of simulation.
frequency.title: Frequency

frequency_offset.description: Offset (in number of physical time steps) at which output animation is started. 0 is at beginning of simulation.
frequency_offset.title: Frequency Offset

write_single_file.description: Enable writing all surface outputs into a single file instead of one file per surface. This option currently only supports Tecplot output format. Will choose the value of the last instance of this option of the same output type (SurfaceOutput or TimeAverageSurfaceOutput) in the `output` list.
write_single_file.title: Write Single File

title: SurfaceOutput
